description.p: The EclipseLink 2.2 release focuses on providing advanced persistence features for user of relational, XML and Web Services to expose extended persistence features that naturally extend the industry standards in these spaces. As well as these new features, a great emphasis was placed on bug fixing in this release.

ul.li: Monitor persistence performance with the new Performance Monitor ... learn more

description.p: The EclipseLink 2.2 release will remain available for download from the primary download page until the next release is shipped. At that point it will be moved to the previous releases page where it remain for a minimum period of 2 years before becoming available for archival.
For more information about future planned EclipseLink releases and patch sets please refer to the releases section of the project summary.
